name: Hamter
description:
Welcome to Hamter, the game where you take on the role of a brave hamster armed with nothing but a plastic bottle.
Defend against sneaky snakes and destroy their precious eggs. With lightning-fast reflexes and a keen eye, you must dodge and weave through the wriggling serpent horde to protect your hamster homeland. But don't worry, this is no ordinary hamster - with your fearless determination and quick thinking, you'll be able to conquer any challenge that comes your way. So get ready to show those slithery snakes who's boss in Hamter!
